text: William J. Andress (June 28, 1924 – May 19, 2008) was a professional baseball umpire. Andress umpired 3 National League games in .Retrosheet After his death in 2008, his body was donated to the University of Cincinnati College of Science.Obituary ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Major League Baseball umpires Category:Body donors
title: Bill Andress
